Function.Name: WriteOperatingModeSelect
Function.Desc: Selects the image operating mode for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadOperatingModeSelect
Function.Desc: Reads the state of the image operating mode for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteExternalVideoSourceFormatSelect
Function.Desc: Specifies the active external video port and the source data type for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadExternalVideoSourceFormatSelect
Function.Desc: Reads the state of the active external video port and the source data type for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteVideoChromaProcessingSelect
Function.Desc: Specifies the characteristics of the selected YCbCr source and the type of chroma processing that will be used for the YCbCr source in the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadVideoChromaProcessingSelect
Function.Desc: Reads the specified characteristics for the selected YCrCb source and the chroma processing used.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteSolidField
Function.Desc: Writes a solid field pattern as internal test pattern for display.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: Border
Param.Desc: Enable 1 pixel wide white border around the test pattern. 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Function.Name: WriteHorizontalRamp
Function.Desc: Writes a horizontal ramp pattern as internal test pattern for display.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: Border
Param.Desc: Enable 1 pixel wide white border around the test pattern. 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Function.Name: WriteVerticalRamp
Function.Desc: Writes a vertical ramp pattern as internal test pattern for display.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: Border
Param.Desc: Enable 1 pixel wide white border around the test pattern. 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Function.Name: WriteHorizontalLines
Function.Desc: Writes a horizontal lines pattern as internal test pattern for display.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: Border
Param.Desc: Enable 1 pixel wide white border around the test pattern. 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Function.Name: WriteDiagonalLines
Function.Desc: Writes a diagonal lines pattern as internal test pattern for display.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: Border
Param.Desc: Enable 1 pixel wide white border around the test pattern. 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Param.Name: HorizontalSpacing
Param.Desc: The horizontal spacing

Param.Name: VerticalSpacing
Param.Desc: The vertical spacing

Function.Name: WriteVerticalLines
Function.Desc: Writes a vertical lines pattern as internal test pattern for display.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: Border
Param.Desc: Enable 1 pixel wide white border around the test pattern. 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Param.Name: ForegroundLineWidth
Param.Desc: The foreground line width

Param.Name: BackgroundLineWidth
Param.Desc: The background line width

Function.Name: WriteGridLines
Function.Desc: Writes a grid lines pattern as internal test pattern for display.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteCheckerboard
Function.Desc: Writes a checkerboard pattern as internal test pattern for display. 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: Border
Param.Desc: Enable 1 pixel wide white border around the test pattern. 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Param.Name: HorizontalCheckerCount
Param.Desc: The range is 0 to 2047.

Param.Name: VerticalCheckerCount
Param.Desc: The range is 0 to 2047.

Function.Name: WriteColorbars
Function.Desc: Writes a colorbars pattern as internal test pattern for display.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: Border
Param.Desc: Enable 1 pixel wide white border around the test pattern. 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Function.Name: ReadTestPatternSelect
Function.Desc: Reads back the host-specified parameters for an internal test pattern.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteSplashScreenSelect
Function.Desc: Selects the index of a splash screen that is to be displayed. See also Write Splash Screen Execute.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: SplashScreenIndex
Param.Desc: The splash screen index, zero-based (the first splash screen stored in flash is index 0).

Function.Name: ReadSplashScreenSelect
Function.Desc: Returns the index of a splash screen that is to be displayed (or is being displayed).

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: SplashScreenIndex
Param.Desc: The splash screen index, zero-based (the first splash screen stored in flash is index 0).

Function.Name: ReadSplashScreenHeader
Function.Desc: Read Splash screen header

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: SplashScreenIndex
Param.Desc: The splash screen index, zero-based (the first splash screen stored in flash is index 0).

Function.Name: WriteImageCrop
Function.Desc: Specifies which portion of the input image is to be displayed the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: CaptureStartPixel
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: CaptureStartLine
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: PixelsPerLine
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: LinesPerFrame
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Function.Name: ReadImageCrop
Function.Desc: Reads the state of the image crop settings from the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: CaptureStartPixel
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: CaptureStartLine
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: PixelsPerLine
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: LinesPerFrame
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Function.Name: WriteDisplayImageOrientation
Function.Desc: Specifies the image orientation of the displayed image for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadDisplayImageOrientation
Function.Desc: Reads the state of the displayed image orientation function for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteDisplayImageCurtain
Function.Desc: Controls the display image curtain for the projection module. An image curtain fills the entire display with the selected color regardless of selected operating mode (except for Internal Pattern Streaming).

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadDisplayImageCurtain
Function.Desc: Reads the state of the image curtain control function for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteImageFreeze
Function.Desc: Enables or disables the image freeze function for the projection module. If enabled, this preserves the current image data.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadImageFreeze
Function.Desc: Reads the state of the image freeze function for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteLookSelect
Function.Desc: Specifies the Look for the image on the projection module. A Look typically specifies a target white point.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: LookNumber
Param.Desc: Zero-based index.

Function.Name: ReadLookSelect
Function.Desc: Reads the state of the Look select command for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: LookNumber
Param.Desc: Zero-based index.

Param.Name: SequenceIndex
Param.Desc: Zero-based index.

Param.Name: SequenceFrameTime
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Function.Name: ReadSequenceHeaderAttributes
Function.Desc: Reads Look and Sequence header information for the active Look and Sequence of the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteExecuteFlashBatchFile
Function.Desc: Executes a batch file stored in the flash image.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: BatchFileNumber
Param.Desc: Zero-based index.

Function.Name: WriteInputImageSize
Function.Desc: Specifies the active data size of the external input image to the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: PixelsPerLine
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: LinesPerFrame
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Function.Name: ReadInputImageSize
Function.Desc: Reads the specified data size of the external input image to the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: PixelsPerLine
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: LinesPerFrame
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Function.Name: WriteSplashScreenExecute
Function.Desc: Retrieves the select splash screen from flash for display on the projection module. See also Write Splash Screen Select.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteMirrorLock
Function.Desc: This command is used to lock/unlock the DMD interface for optical alignment. When locked, DMD mirrors will not change state.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadMirrorLock
Function.Desc: Reads the lock/unlock state of the DMD interface for optical alignment.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteLedOutputControlMethod
Function.Desc: Specifies the method for controlling the LED outputs for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadLedOutputControlMethod
Function.Desc: Reads the state of the LED output control method for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteRgbLedEnable
Function.Desc: Enables the LEDs for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: RedLedEnable
Param.Desc: 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Param.Name: GreenLedEnable
Param.Desc: 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Param.Name: BlueLedEnable
Param.Desc: 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Function.Name: ReadRgbLedEnable
Function.Desc: Reads the state of the LED enables for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: RedLedEnable
Param.Desc: 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Param.Name: GreenLedEnable
Param.Desc: 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Param.Name: BlueLedEnable
Param.Desc: 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Function.Name: WriteRgbLedCurrent
Function.Desc: Sets the IDAC register value of the PMIC for the red, green, and blue LEDs. This value directly controls the LED current.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: RedLedCurrent
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: GreenLedCurrent
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: BlueLedCurrent
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Function.Name: ReadRgbLedCurrent
Function.Desc: Reads the state of the current for the red, green, and blue LEDs. This value directly controls the LED current.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: RedLedCurrent
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: GreenLedCurrent
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: BlueLedCurrent
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Function.Name: ReadCaicLedMaxAvailablePower
Function.Desc: Reads the specified maximum LED power (Watts) allowed for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: MaxLedPower
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Function.Name: WriteRgbLedMaxCurrent

Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: MaxRedLedCurrent
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: MaxGreenLedCurrent
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: MaxBlueLedCurrent
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Function.Name: ReadRgbLedMaxCurrent
Function.Desc: Reads the specified maximum LED current allowed for each LED in the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: MaxRedLedCurrent
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: MaxGreenLedCurrent
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: MaxBlueLedCurrent
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Function.Name: ReadCaicRgbLedCurrent
Function.Desc: Reads the state of the current for the red, green, and blue LEDs of the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: RedLedCurrent
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: GreenLedCurrent
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: BlueLedCurrent
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Function.Name: WriteLocalAreaBrightnessBoostControl
Function.Desc: Controls the local area brightness boost image processing functionality for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadLocalAreaBrightnessBoostControl
Function.Desc: Reads the state of the local area brightness boost image processing functionality for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteCaicImageProcessingControl
Function.Desc: Controls the CAIC functionality for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadCaicImageProcessingControl
Function.Desc: Reads the state of the CAIC functionality within the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteColorCoordinateAdjustmentControl
Function.Desc: Controls the Color Coordinate Adjustment (CCA) image processing functionality for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: CcaEnable
Param.Desc: Must be enabled during normal operation. 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Function.Name: ReadColorCoordinateAdjustmentControl
Function.Desc: Reads the state of the Color Coordinate Adjustment (CCA) image processing within the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: CcaEnable
Param.Desc: 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Function.Name: WriteKeystoneCorrectionControl
Function.Desc: Controls the keystone correction image processing functionality for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: KeystoneCorrectionEnable
Param.Desc: 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Param.Name: OpticalThrowRatio
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: OpticalDmdOffset
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Function.Name: ReadKeystoneCorrectionControl
Function.Desc: Reads the state of the keystone correction image processing within the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: KeystoneCorrectionEnable
Param.Desc: 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Param.Name: OpticalThrowRatio
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Param.Name: OpticalDmdOffset
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Function.Name: WriteKeystoneProjectionPitchAngle
Function.Desc: Specifies the keystone projection pitch angle for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: PitchAngle
Param.Desc: The range is -40 to 40.

Function.Name: ReadKeystoneProjectionPitchAngle
Function.Desc: Reads the specified keystone projection pitch angle for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: PitchAngle
Param.Desc: The range is -40 to 40.

Function.Name: WriteDsiHsClockInput
Function.Desc: Sets the input DSI high speed clock frequency in MHz.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadDsiHsClockInput
Function.Desc: Gets the expected input DSI high speed clock frequency in MHz.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadShortStatus
Function.Desc: Provides a brief system status for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadSystemStatus
Function.Desc: Reads system status information for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadSystemSoftwareVersion
Function.Desc: Reads the Arm software version (main application) information for the projection module. This application is part of the firmware image.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadCommunicationStatus
Function.Desc: Reads I2C communication status information for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadControllerDeviceId
Function.Desc: Reads the controller device ID for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadDmdDeviceId
Function.Desc: Reads the DMD device ID or DMD fuse data for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadSystemTemperature
Function.Desc: Reads the System Temperature.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteDsiPortEnable
Function.Desc: Enables the DSI port for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadDsiPortEnable
Function.Desc: Returns the state of the DSI port for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadFirmwareBuildVersion
Function.Desc: Reads the controller firmware version for the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadFlashUpdatePrecheck
Function.Desc: Verifies that a pending flash update (write) is appropriate for the specified block of the projection module flash. Must have called Write Flash Data Type Select prior.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: FlashUpdatePackageSize
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Function.Name: WriteFlashDataTypeSelect
Function.Desc: Selects the data block that will be written/read from the flash.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteFlashDataLength
Function.Desc: Specifies the length in bytes of data that will be written/read from the flash.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Param.Name: FlashDataLength
Param.Desc: LSB first.

Function.Name: WriteFlashErase
Function.Desc: Erases the selected flash data.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteFlashStart
Function.Desc: Writes data to the flash.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteFlashContinue
Function.Desc: Writes data to the flash.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadFlashStart
Function.Desc: Reads data from the flash.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadFlashContinue
Function.Desc: Reads data from the flash.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteInternalRegisterAddress
Function.Desc: Specifies the address of an internal register in the projection module. This command is sent before a register read/write.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WriteInternalRegister
Function.Desc: Writes data to an internal register of the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadInternalRegister
Function.Desc: Reads data from an internal register of the projection module.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WritePadRegisterAddress
Function.Desc: Specifies the address of an external PAD register in the projection module. This command is sent before a register read/write.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: WritePadRegister
Function.Desc: Writes data to an external PAD register.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Function.Name: ReadPadRegister
Function.Desc: Reads data from an external PAD register.

Param.Name: Summary
Param.Desc: Status and summary of command execution.

Member.Name: Command
Member.Desc: Defined by the border color command

Member.Name: EntireFlashNoOem
Member.Desc: Entire Flash except OEM Calibration and Scratchpad Data

Member.Name: Manual
Member.Desc: Enabled: Manual strength control (no light sensor)

Member.Name: Automatic
Member.Desc: Enabled: Automatic strength control (uses light sensor - not supported)

Member.Name: Manual
Member.Desc: Manual RGB LED currents (disables CAIC algorithm)

Member.Name: Automatic
Member.Desc: CAIC (automatic) RGB LED power (enables CAIC algorithm)

Member.Name: DmdInterfaceUnlockDelay100MsDmdInterfaceLock
Member.Desc: DMD Interface Unlock, delay 100ms, DMD Interface Lock

Member.Name: Pattern22
Member.Desc: Two frames repeat, two frames repeat, etc. (2:2 pattern)

Member.Name: Pattern32
Member.Desc: Three frames repeat, two frames repeat, etc. (3:2 pattern)

Member.Name: MaxPatternOrderTableEntriesExceeded
Member.Desc: Max Pattern Order Table Entries Exceeded

Member.Name: InternalPatternDisplayAndTimingConfigurationNotSupported
Member.Desc: Internal Pattern Display and Timing Configuration Not Supported

Member.Name: InternalPatternDisplayConfigurationNotSupported
Member.Desc: Internal Pattern Display Configuration Not Supported

Member.Name: Successful
Member.Desc: A boolean value indicating if the command execution was successful.

Member.Name: Border
Member.Desc: Enable 1 pixel wide white border around the test pattern. 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Member.Name: LookMaxFrameTime
Member.Desc: Maximum frame period supported by selected sequence in current look. LSB first.

Member.Name: LookMinFrameTime
Member.Desc: Minimum frame period supported by selected sequence in current look. LSB first.

Member.Name: SeqMaxFrameTime
Member.Desc: Maximum frame period supported by selected sequence. LSB first.

Member.Name: SeqMinFrameTime
Member.Desc: Minimum frame period supported by selected sequence. LSB first.

Member.Name: Border
Member.Desc: Enable 1 pixel wide white border around the test pattern. 0: Disable, 1: Enable

Member.Name: StartValue
Member.Desc: Starting pixel value for horizontal/vertical ramp.

Member.Name: EndValue
Member.Desc: Ending pixel value for horizontal/vertical ramp.

Member.Name: ForegroundLineWidth
Member.Desc: Foreground line width for horizontal/vertical lines.

Member.Name: BackgroundLineWidth
Member.Desc: Background line width for horizontal/vertical lines.

Member.Name: HorizontalForegroundLineWidth
Member.Desc: Horizontal foreground line width for grid lines.

Member.Name: HorizontalBackgroundLineWidth
Member.Desc: Horizontal background line width for grid lines.

Member.Name: HorizontalCheckerCount
Member.Desc: Number of horizontal checkers in checkerboard.

Member.Name: VerticalForegroundLineWidth
Member.Desc: Vertical foreground line width for grid lines.

Member.Name: VerticalBackgroundLineWidth
Member.Desc: Vertical background line width for grid lines.

Member.Name: VerticalCheckerCount
Member.Desc: Number of vertical checkers in checkerboard.
